Giving Businesses the Freedom to Sell Where and How They Want

When selling with ThreadMeUp, you use timed storefronts, called Movements that allow customers to buy your products before they are produced. You can use Movements on our Platform, called Marketplace, or on Shopify.

  • Complete Reliability

    We ensure a high-quality experience by rigorously evaluating partner in our network

  • Fast Turnaround

    We are continually improving our shipping times to get your products to your customers as fast as possible

  • Worldwide Shipping

    Reach all of your customers, no matter where they are with domestic, Canada, and international shipping

  • On-Demand Production

    No sales minimums—sell a single product and it will begin processing and moved towards production immediately.

  • Automated Payment Processing

    Upon order completion, your customer’s payment is processed by us with profit being sent directly to you.

  • Great Pricing

    Our fulfillment network is streamlined to ensure the most profitable partners are used for each of your orders.
